bibl.title: Septuagint Research: A Plea for a Return to Basic Issues.
bibl.note: This article was given orally as an invited presentation to the Society of Biblical Literature, New York, 21 December 1982. See p. 302: supposed Hebraizing corrections in Chester Beatty Biblical Papyri IV and V (= van Haelst 7-8), P. Bodmer XXIV (= van Haelst 118) and P. Fuad 266 (= van Haelst 56).
bibl.seg: Pietersma Albert, Septuagint Research: A Plea for a Return to Basic Issues.

This article was given orally as an invited presentation to the Society of Biblical Literature, New York, 21 December 1982. See p. 302: supposed Hebraizing corrections in Chester Beatty Biblical Papyri IV and V (= van Haelst 7-8), P. Bodmer XXIV (= van Haelst 118) and P. Fuad 266 (= van Haelst 56).
